my grandson s favorite type of cake is chocolate.

my favorite season is duck hunting season.

I love my students.

content.text: What's up?
Not much. Just got back from work. I'm teaching a new project with my girlfriend.
Sounds fun. I teach kindergarten and I bring a snack to work so I'm not starving by the time my students arrive.
That's smart. I used to teach first grade and I would always get hungry during lunch.
What's your favorite season?
My favorite season is the fall because the weather is perfect and the leaves change colors.
I love the fall too. My favorite season is duck hunting season because I love spending time with my dad and grandson.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love spending time with my family too.
What do you do for fun?
I love to sing in the church choir and I also love to exercise.
That's great. I love to exercise too. I try to eat healthy foods and exercise regularly because I want to get in better shape for my girlfriend and baby.
That's great. I'm trying to eat healthy foods and exercise regularly too. I sometimes eat too much sugar, which can cause my blood sugar levels to spike.
That's good. I try to avoid too much sugar because it can make me feel sick.
Me too. I've been trying to cut down on my sugar intake.
That's good. I'm glad you're trying to be healthy.
Me too. I want to be healthy for my family and friends.
That's great. I'm glad you have such a great support system.
Me too. I'm grateful for my family and friends.
You're welcome. I'm glad I could talk to you today.
Me too. It was nice talking to you.
